title: BRIEF-Amazon And Ring Close Acquisition窶年ow Working Together To Empower Neighbors With Affordable Ways To Monitor Their Homes And Reduce Crime In Neighborhoods
text:
Market News April 12, 2018 / 3:24 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Amazon And Ring Close Acquisition窶年ow Working Together To Empower Neighbors With Affordable Ways To Monitor Their Homes And Reduce Crime In Neighborhoods Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Amazon.com Inc: 
* AMAZON AND RING CLOSE ACQUISITION窶年OW WORKING TOGETHER TO EMPOWER NEIGHBORS WITH AFFORDABLE WAYS TO MONITOR THEIR HOMES AND REDUCE CRIME IN NEIGHBORHOODS 
* AMAZON & RING HAVE DROPPED PRICE OF RING VIDEO DOORBELL TO $99.99 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
